name: Royal Ontario Museum
description: Sprawling natural history & world cultures galleries, plus dinosaurs in the Libeskind crystal wing.

name: Art Gallery of Ontario
description: Large gallery with huge Canadian collection, European masterworks & a major Frank Gehry renovation.

name: Graffiti Alley
description: A fantastic place to see murals, and an important location in the history of Toronto's legal street art scene.

name: Casa Loma
description: Grand 18th-century castle featuring regular tours & gardens that are open seasonally.
